en-US.label: Advanced Provisioner
en-US.description: This app allows you to customize every setting available on your device, with our Advanced Provisioner.
en-US.extended_description: Provision most SIP endpoints quickly and easily. Our auto-provisioning service allows you to program physical VoIP devices remotely, speeding up deployment and allowing for ongoing management. Setup intelligent defaults for a reseller, then override specific features on a per-account basis as customers request different behavior. Or, further customize individual phones as needed. Remotely reboot phones to force them to update their configuration, without having to visit the customerâ€™s site. Enhanced security provides for unique per-account hashes and IP-based abuse detection to deter hacking.
